text:
People Can’t Get Enough Of Taimur Doll! Sister Sara Ali Khan Gets It As A Gift & We’re Creeped Out
People Can’t Get Enough Of Taimur Doll! Sister Sara Ali Khan Gets It As A Gift & We’re Creeped Out
The little one can’t live in peace. In the age, when he should be playing with toys, Taimur is exposed to the media glare. The paparazzi goes crazy following him almost everywhere and leaking his new pictures and videos.
Somebody has made a doll that looks like Taimur and it’s selling on First Cry. Yeah, you can buy that too, for whatever reasons.
Also Read: Saif Ali Khan Is Stunned Seeing Taimur’s Doll, Feels He Should Trademark His Son's Name
It’s just getting crazy with every passing day. After the news of Taimur doll took us all by surprise, it apparently didn’t end there.
When Taimur’s sister Sara Ali Khan appeared on Koffee With Karan, she talked about her little brother too. She is all set to make her debut in the industry with Sushant Singh Rajput starrer Kedarnath, and she is on a promotion spree.
Don't Miss 234 SHARES 7.9 K SHARES 707 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES
When she visited the sets of reality TV show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa 2018, she got a rather unique gift – a doll of her brother Taimur Ali Khan. That’s creepy, don’t you think?
Being the good sister that she is, Sara Ali Khan said, “I am glad people are benefiting from him. I only ask God for his safety and happiness in return,” and hugged the doll.
But what’s wrong with people?! Why make a Taimur Doll in the first place?
title: People Can’t Get Enough Of Taimur Doll! Sis Sara Ali Khan Gets It As A Gift & We’re Creeped Out
description: When Sara Ali Khan visited the sets of reality TV show Sa Re Ga Ma Pa 2018, she got a rather unique gift – a doll of her brother Taimur Ali Khan. That’s creepy, don’t you think? Being the good sister that she is, Sara Ali Khan said, “I am glad people are benefiting from him. I only ask God for his safety and happiness in return,” and hugged the doll.
